jcr:content.jcr:description: Secure App Service.Code signing certificates are digital certificates that will help protect users from downloading compromised files or applications.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Secure App Service
jcr:content.keywords: secure app service, enterprise code signing
jcr:content.pageTitle: Secure App Service - Code Signing for the Enterprise

containercomponent.desc: Your reputation. Your assets. Your brand. Simplify control over all if it, with code signing and key storage in the secure cloud. All from a single dashboard.
containercomponent.subtitle: Symantec Secure App Service

icontextandtitle.description2: Provides granular insight into all code signing activities, secure cloud storage, full reporting and auditing
Supports all major file types and multiple signing methods, with fast revocation and backdating
Unsurpassed protection with robust PKI infrastructure, automatic malware pre-scanning, and cloud-based key generation.

containercomponentex.desc: Symantec Secure App Services protects your business against code signing threats and mismanagement risk. Our industry leading cloud service lowers costs, keeps you in control, and makes "scalability" manageable.
containercomponentex.subtitle: Facts

icontextandtitle.description4: Sign desktop files and apps and with cloud-based keys for maximum security

icontextandtitle_683229336.description4: Avoid security risk and business disruption with tight control of access to app and file signatures

icontextandtitle.alternatetext: Rotating Keys, Unique Keys, Multiple Signing Services
icontextandtitle.description4: Complies with the security requirement for Microsoft Azure cloud platform.
icontextandtitle.imgtitle: Rotating Keys, Unique Keys, Multiple Signing Services
icontextandtitle.link4: Rotating Keys, Unique Keys, Multiple Signing Services

icontextandtitle_1802186882.description4: Enforce accountability and compliance easily: Audit logs track and report activities for you

links.links: [{"text":"Cloud-based with easy-to-use dashboard for code signing and management of keys and signing requests"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"Reports and audit logs to track signed code and activities"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"Support for all major file types: Microsoft\, Java desktop\, Java mobile\, Android\, PDF\, XML\, file hashes and others"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"Access restriction by IP range and IP logging when applications are signed"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"Pre-signing malware scanning using Symantec Protection Engine"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"Unlimited test signings and capability to integrate with third-party test houses"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"SOAP APIs for integration with other systems and workflows"\,"url":"#"},{"text":"$1\,500\,000 warranty"\,"url":"#"}]

imageandtext.desc: Create a digital "shrink-wrap" for secure distribution of code and content over the Internet. Symantec adds a high-level of trust by providing world-class authentication of the code signer.
imageandtext.subtitle: More Than Just Secure App Service
imageandtext.title: Explore complete website security

containercomponent.subtitle: For every security need, a solution

imagetextandtitle.description: Inability to keep track of all keys makes business and consumers vulnerable
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Consumer Apps

imagetextandtitle.description: Complexity and difficulty of internally developing code signing security processes and controls creates significant risk
imagetextandtitle.subtitle: Internal Apps

imagetextandtitle.description: Shared keys among many developers moves them out of reach of the organization’s visibility and control

carousel.desc: [“During the test\, users were more likely to click through and make a purchase when they saw the Norton Secured Seal. Based on this\, it’s clear to me that the Norton Secured Seal had the same\, if not better\, effect on helping my customers feel confident about making a purchase.”,“During the test\, users were more likely to click through and make a purchase when they saw the Norton Secured Seal. Based on this\, it’s clear to me that the Norton Secured Seal had the same\, if not better\, effect on helping my customers feel confident about making a purchase.”,Brand protection is a top priority for ebay. The company implemented a large portfolio of Symantec security solutions for everything from data loss prevention\, to endpoint security\, to managed security\, to encryption technologies.,“With Symantec solutions\, we’re able to do more with the resources that we have. We can handle day-to-day operations while continuing to expand services to the county.”,“The trust factor was the main reason we chose Symantec. The Norton Secured Seal is very well known in the market.”]
